mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, PASSWORD_CONFIRM, NAME, BIRTH, TEL, EMAIL, ADDRESS, POINT FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, PASSWORD_CONFIRM, NAME, BIRTH, TEL, EMAIL, ADDRESS, POINT) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{passwordConfirm}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{address}, #{point})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, PASSWORD_CONFIRM = #{passwordConfirm}, NAME = #{name}, BIRTH = #{birth}, TEL = #{tel}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, POINT = #{point} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
